name: PKAddCarKeyPassConfiguration
desc: A specialized configuration object that PassKit uses when it creates a digital car key.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a digital car key configuration object.

items.name: var supportedRadioTechnologies: PKRadioTechnology
items.desc: The wireless radio technology that the key uses.

items.name: struct PKRadioTechnology
items.desc: Constants that describe the type of wireless radio technology that a pass uses.

items.name: var password: String
items.desc: A one-time password that the vehicle manufacturer provides.
